copilot-custom-prompts/emojify.html.title: Emojify
copilot-custom-prompts/emojify.html.description:
Add relevant emojis to enhance {}. Follow these rules:
1. Insert emojis at natural breaks in the text
2. Never place two emojis next to each other
3. Keep all original text unchanged
4. Choose emojis that match the context and tone
Return only the emojified text.
copilot-custom-prompts/emojify.html.author: hyx

copilot-custom-prompts/explain-like-i-am.title: Explain like I am 5
copilot-custom-prompts/explain-like-i-am.description:
Explain {} in simple terms that a 5-year-old would understand:
1. Use basic vocabulary
2. Include simple analogies
3. Break down complex concepts
Return only the simplified explanation.
copilot-custom-prompts/explain-like-i-am.author: hyx

copilot-custom-prompts/fix-grammar-and-s.title: Fix grammar and spelling
copilot-custom-prompts/fix-grammar-and-s.description: Fix the grammar and spelling of {}. Preserve all formatting, line breaks, and special characters. Do not add or remove any content. Return only the corrected text.
copilot-custom-prompts/fix-grammar-and-s.author: hyx

copilot-custom-prompts/generate-glossary.title: Generate glossary
copilot-custom-prompts/generate-glossary.description: Create a glossary of important terms, concepts, and phrases from {}. Format each entry as "Term: Definition". Sort entries alphabetically. Return only the glossary.
copilot-custom-prompts/generate-glossary.author: hyx

copilot-custom-prompts/generate-table-of.title: Generate table of contents
copilot-custom-prompts/generate-table-of.description: Generate a hierarchical table of contents for {}. Use appropriate heading levels (H1, H2, H3, etc.). Include page numbers if present. Return only the table of contents.
copilot-custom-prompts/generate-table-of.author: hyx

copilot-custom-prompts/make-longer.html.title: Make longer
copilot-custom-prompts/make-longer.html.description:
Expand {} to twice its length by:
1. Adding relevant details and examples
2. Elaborating on key points
3. Maintaining the original tone and style
Return only the expanded text.
copilot-custom-prompts/make-longer.html.author: hyx

copilot-custom-prompts/make-shorter.html.title: Make shorter
copilot-custom-prompts/make-shorter.html.description:
Reduce {} to half its length while preserving these elements:
1. Main ideas and key points
2. Essential details
3. Original tone and style
Return only the shortened text.
copilot-custom-prompts/make-shorter.html.author: hyx

copilot-custom-prompts/remove-urls.html.title: Remove URLs
copilot-custom-prompts/remove-urls.html.description: Remove all URLs from {}. Preserve all other content and formatting. URLs may be in various formats (http, https, www). Return only the text with URLs removed.
copilot-custom-prompts/remove-urls.html.author: hyx

copilot-custom-prompts/rewrite-as-tweet..title: Rewrite as tweet
copilot-custom-prompts/rewrite-as-tweet..description:
Rewrite {} as a single tweet with these requirements:
1. Maximum 280 characters
2. Use concise, impactful language
3. Maintain the core message
Return only the tweet text.
copilot-custom-prompts/rewrite-as-tweet..author: hyx

copilot-custom-prompts/rewrite-as-tweet-.title: Rewrite as tweet thread
copilot-custom-prompts/rewrite-as-tweet-.description:
Convert {} into a Twitter thread following these rules:
1. Each tweet must be under 240 characters
2. Start with "THREAD START" on its own line
3. Separate tweets with ""
4. End with "THREAD END" on its own line
5. Make content engaging and clear
Return only the formatted thread.
copilot-custom-prompts/rewrite-as-tweet-.author: hyx

copilot-custom-prompts/simplify.html.title: Simplify
copilot-custom-prompts/simplify.html.description: Simplify {} to a 6th-grade reading level (ages 11-12). Use simple sentences, common words, and clear explanations. Maintain the original key concepts. Return only the simplified text.
copilot-custom-prompts/simplify.html.author: hyx

copilot-custom-prompts/summarize.html.title: Summarize
copilot-custom-prompts/summarize.html.description: Create a bullet-point summary of {}. Each bullet point should capture a key point. Return only the bullet-point summary.
copilot-custom-prompts/summarize.html.author: hyx

copilot-custom-prompts/translate-to-chin.title: Translate to Chinese
copilot-custom-prompts/translate-to-chin.description:
Translate {} into Chinese:
1. Preserve the meaning and tone
2. Maintain appropriate cultural context
3. Keep formatting and structure
Return only the translated text.
copilot-custom-prompts/translate-to-chin.author: hyx

math/abstract-algebra/group-theory/4.5-s.title: 4.5 Sylow's theorem
math/abstract-algebra/group-theory/4.5-s.description:
Theorem 18 (Sylow's Theorem) Let be a group of order , where is a prime not dividing . (1) Sylow -subgroups of exist, i.e., . (2) If is a Sylow -subgroup of and is any -subgroup of , then there exists such that , i.e., is contained in some conjugate of . In particular, any two Sylow -subgroups of are conjugate in . (3) The number of Sylow -subgroups of is of the form , i.e., . Further, is the index in of the normalizer for any Sylow -subgroup , hence . 考虑在里面可由共轭到达的所有群，这些群的集合记为 考虑在该群下的作用（conjugation），把S分成了若干共轭类 不妨设的一个代表元恰好是，则 如果，意味着 ，最后与矛盾. 运用数学归纳法，如果的中心被p整除，考虑陪集即可，反之，如果不被p整除，我们能找到一个conjugacy class，个数大于一且不被整除，意味着找到了一个比小且p的幂次相同的群，证毕 把取成某个用上面的步骤即可 Corollary 20. Let be a Sylow -subgroup of . Then the following are equivalent: is the unique Sylow -subgroup of , i.e., . is normal in . is characteristic in . All subgroups generated by elements of -power order are -groups, i.e., if is any subset of such that is a power of for all , then is a -group. Sylow定理可以与素数阶元素的计数结合使用来产生正规子群。
每个Sylow-p群会对应p-1个阶为p的元素，且Sylow-p子群两两只会在identity处相交，因此，Sylow群越多（corollary 20告诉我们，Sylow-p子群唯一等价于该Sylow-p子群normal），可以被计数的元素就越多，也许会超出群元素个数导出矛盾，这可以反推normal性质 proposition 如果是的一个Sylow-p子群，则 这是明显的，因为恰好是以共轭为group action的时候，能够到达的的群的个数，即Sylow-p子群的个数 Sylow定理可以用来探索群的结构

info_type.description: 该功能将放置在该元素之前、之后，还是内部（开头或结尾）。

info_featurePlacement.description: 将此功能放置在页面上的位置（相对于选择器）。

info_displayTitle.description: 功能上方显示的描述性标题

info_showOrphanNodes.description: 显示未连接到任何其他节点的节点。

info_showAttachments.description: 将附件（如图像和PDF）显示为图中的节点。

info_allowGlobalGraph.description: 允许用户查看所有节点的全局图。

info_allowExpand.description: 允许用户将图形视图弹出至全屏显示。

info_attractionForce.description: 链接节点之间的吸引力有多大？吸引力越大，图形将显得越集中。

info_linkLength.description: 节点之间的链接应有多长？链接越短，节点将聚集得更紧密。

info_repulsionForce.description: 节点之间的排斥力有多大？排斥力越大，分离的节点将分散得越远。

info_centralForce.description: 节点被吸引到中心的程度有多大？吸引力越大，图形看起来越密集和呈圆形。

info_edgePruning.description: 超过此阈值长度的边将不会显示，但仍然参与图形计算。这有助于大型复杂图形显得更加有序。悬停在节点上时，仍会显示这些链接。

info_minNodeRadius.description: 最小节点的大小是多少？节点越小，吸引其他节点的力量越小。

info_maxNodeRadius.description: 最大节点的大小是多少？节点大小取决于它们的链接数量。节点越大，吸引其他节点的力量越大。这有助于围绕最重要的节点形成良好的分组。

info_allowResizing.description: 是否允许用户调整侧边栏的大小

info_allowCollapsing.description: 是否允许用户折叠侧边栏

info_selector.description: 用于定位元素的CSS选择器。功能将相对于该元素放置。

info_type.description: 该功能将放置在该元素之前、之后，还是内部（开头或结尾）。
